title: Struggling to Understand Your Strava Stats? ‘Athlete Intelligence’ Is Here to Help You.
content:
Thought Stava was only for the kudos? New A.I.-powered feature promises to analyze and interpret workout data and provide guidance for the future.

Read the full article at Struggling to Understand Your Strava Stats? ‘Athlete Intelligence’ Is Here to Help You. on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
